author: pburba
msg: Misc fixes on svn status, add, cat, and revert for OS/400.
(AGAINST_STR, PATH_STR, REVISION_STR, STATUS_STR, TARGET_STR): New utf-8
print_finish_target_xml): Use new utf-8 symbols in place of string
literals.  Use APR_PSPRINTF2 to create utf-8 xml strings.
(trim_string): Use utf-8 aware APR_IS_ASCII_SPACE instead of
(TMP_STR, DOT_TMP_STR): New utf-8 escaped symbolic constants.
(svn_client_cat2): Use new utf-8 symbols in place of string literals.
(SVN_WC__REVERT_EXT): Hex escape symbolic constant with utf-8 value.

author: pburba
msg: Misc fixes on svnadmin and svnlook port for OS/400.
(main): Convert opt_arg to utf-8 before calling svn_opt_parse_revision.
(main): Fixed several cases where SVN_CMDLINE_FPRINTF wrote utf-8 to stderr.
Used SVN_CMDLINE_FPRINTF2 or svn_cmdline_fprintf as appropriateto ensure

author: pburba
msg: Misc general fixes related to port of svn CL to AS/400.
(default_adm_dir_name): Hex escape string literal with utf-8 value.
(svn_ebcdic_set_file_mtime): Fix bug where month was zero based.
